description: Karma target options for Build Facade.
title: Karma Target

___ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.

___input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

___inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

___bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

___lazy.description: If the bundle will be lazy loaded.

___browsers.description: Override which browsers tests are run against.

___webWorkerTsConfig.description: TypeScript configuration for Web Worker modules.

___main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

___scripts.description: Global scripts to be included in the build.

___inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

___bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

___lazy.description: If the bundle will be lazy loaded.

___poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

___karmaConfig.description: The name of the Karma configuration file.

___polyfills.description: The name of the polyfills file.

___reporters.description: Karma reporters to use. Directly passed to the karma runner.

___codeCoverageExclude.description: Globs to exclude from code coverage.

___progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

___preserveSymlinks.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules.

___include.description:
Globs of files to include, relative to workspace or project root. 
There are 2 special cases:
 - when a path to directory is provided, all spec files ending ".spec.@(ts|tsx)" will be included
 - when a path to a file is provided, and a matching spec file exists it will be included instead

___fileReplacements.description: Replace files with other files in the build.

___ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.

___input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

___styles.description: Global styles to be included in the build.

___inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

___bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

___lazy.description: If the bundle will be lazy loaded.

___tsConfig.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

___stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors

___includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to project root.
